name: gmail-labels-as-tabs
description: Injects a user-configurable tabs bar into Gmail linked to labels.

scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/css dist/icons && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp src/ui/*.css dist/css/ && cp src/popup.html dist/ && cp -r _locales dist/ && cp src/icons/*.png dist/icons/
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../extension.zip .
